title: Salesforce.com Shares, Software Companies Stumble to Start Year
sub_head: Swings in software companies coincide with broader volatility in technology stocks
body:
Salesforce.com Inc. shares tumbled around 6% on Wednesday, continuing a recent stretch of losses that have pulled the software giantâ€™s stock to the lowest levels in months.
The stock is down around 7% this week and has fallen roughly 25% from its 52-week high, FactSet data show.
